content.rendered:
Directed by Silver Tree. Pete Chatmon.

Written by Kevin J. Hynes.

Cast Lizzy Caplan (Alex Forrest). Joshua Jackson (Dan Gallagher). Amanda Peet (Beth Gallagher). Toby Huss (Mike Gerard). Reno Wilson (Earl Broker). Brian Goodman (Arthur Tomlinson). Isabella Briggs (Stella). Carlos Pratts (Benny). Gary Perez (Rolando Cabral). Burt Bulos (Phil Packer). Tiago Roberts (Gabriel Ibarra). Vanessa Martinez (Jeannette Ruiz). Alfred Smith III (Terry Sands). Jesse Mackey (Scanlon). Michelle Twarowska (Olena Kuzma). Ruben Dario (Gideon). Anthony L. Fernandez (Suarez). Theo Wilson (Commissioner Blake). John Getz (Warren). Toks Olagundoye (Conchita Lewis). Jessica Harper (Sophie). Wanda De Jesus (Marcella Leyva). David Sullivan (Frank Gallardo). Randy Vasquez (Leo Gonzalez). Kenzo Lee (Cop #2). Dan Warner (Detective Mullins). Tarina Pouncy (Andrea). Iris Liu (Lia). Ariel Llinas (Al Jollett). Michael Shen (Dr. Herbert Hong). Max Pescherine (Mark). Debbie Fan (Carolina). Doreen Calderon (Maureen Walker). David Saucedo (Jury Foreperson). Mark Anthony Williams (Judge Watson).

Language English.

Producers Jonathan Talbert. Silver Tree. Alexandra Cunningham. Justin Falvey. Darryl Frank. Kevin J. Hynes. Stanley R. Jaffe. Sherry Lansing.

Production Amblin Television. Paramount Television Studios. Paramount Television.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 8

Status On Going (2023–)
